title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description:
When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the properties file
2. Leave the key blank, but enter a valid value

OB: The externalized text in the chart title is not displayed

EB: The externalized text in the chart title should be displayed

SR: 1. Open the properties file
2. Leave the key blank, but enter a valid value
3. Verify that the externalized text is displayed in the chart title
